DOC.brief_summary: Neck shoulder pain ( NSP ) fairly common among high school student Korea . Presumably , high prevalence NSP Korean adolescent consequence inappropriate static position prolong period time . We suspect proper education posture correction Korean adolescent may decrease prevalence severity NSP . Although several study focus etiology NSP adolescence , study address management prevention NSP adolescent , despite high prevalence age group . The aim prospective study identify effect education , term recognition issue posture correction , prevalence severity NSP Korean adolescent
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Education Decreasing Prevalence Severity Neck Shoulder Pain
